title: CDC Guts Childhood Vaccine Schedule - Drops 6 Vaccines Without Scientific Review
summary: Following Trump's December 2025 Presidential Memorandum, CDC reduced universally recommended childhood vaccines from 17 to 11, removing 6 common vaccines. Change enacted without CDC's typical rigorous scientific review process. Major medical groups sued HHS, alleging agencies circumvented normal regulatory processes and violated federal law. Represents massive shift in vaccine policy achieving long-held goal of HHS Secretary RFK Jr., who founded anti-vaccine group Children's Health Defense.
